trends: There have been no other sightings in Commerce
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were on our back deck. Husband noticed strange object. Object appeared to move within a small space, almost a vibration. Like a kid shaking a flashlight. He then noticed 2 more similar objects nearby the first. They each had more than one light, and more than one color of light. He watched them for a very long time. They gradually moved across the sky in no real pattern. When he pointed the first object out to me. He said "What the *^#*@ is that?" I and a friend looked at it. It made me very uncomfortable and both I and my friend went inside the house while my husband continued to observe. He said that he never lost sight of the object. He needed to go to bed.
